name: Beyond your Fear - Teaser Demo
description:
Beyond your Fear is a Psychological choice matter horror.

Descend into atmospheric Psychological horror game where player needs to solve riddles and make hard choices on the way to realize what lies beyond your fear

Controls

WASD  to  Move

Mouse to look around

Left Mouse Click  to Interact

E to Open Inventory

T to Toggle Candle

Right Mouse Click to pick camera, unlit candles

NOTE :  The Demo is Performance heavy  there is currently no graphics option. But it is still playable even on the slowest devices.

Featuring:

Puzzle Solving
Game has variety of riddles .Almost every riddle is unique. Solving them helps player to unveil the mysterious force that holds him.

Atmospheric Investigation
Game features detective storytelling which gives player the ability to figure out what is happening on their own. Using clue system players will progress through story.

What lies beyond your Fear?
At the End of the game Players will answer this question by themselves.

The downloadable demo is currently a short prototype of the game. It focuses mainly on the atmosphere and concept of the project. I hope to release a more in-depth demo in the future as the project continues.
